Hero.About: I am QA Engineer with ambition for the Automation and Front-end Development. Reach out if you would like to learn more!

About.QA-info: I am a QA Engineer with experience in automation using JavaScript or TypeScript. I have used Selenium and WebdriverIO, which is also Selenium based
About.Front-info: I am actively learning about React to help test and develop front-end applications.

Projects.PortfolioDescription: I created this website to showcase my skills and learn more in the process.
Projects.WebdriverIODescription: I created this boilerplate to make it easier to start automating E2E tests.
Projects.PostgresDescription: I created this boilerplate so it will be easier to run tests against a database.
